_source.short_desc: Cohesity ushers in a new era in data management, making it easier than ever to back up, manage and easily extract insights from data.
_source.long_desc: Cohesity ushers in a new era in data management that solves a critical challenge facing businesses today: mass data fragmentation. The vast majority of enterprise data  backups, archives, file shares, object stores, and data used for test/dev and analytics  sits in fragmented infrastructure silos that makes it hard to protect, expensive to manage, and difficult to analyze. Cohesity consolidates silos onto one web-scale platform, spanning on-premises, cloud, and the edge.

category_features.name: Cost Management
category_features.definition: Manage budgets, track and optimize spending and align capacity to workload demand

category_features.name: Multi-Cloud Management
category_features.definition: Allows businesses to monitor and secure applications and workloads across multiple public clouds

category_features.name: Backup Log
category_features.definition: Records the events that occur during a backup process

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Cloud Backup
category_features.definition: Allows back up of files to cloud storage like Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: Copy only the new data that has been changed or created since the previous backup

category_features.name: Customer Database
category_features.definition: Searchable repository of information about clients

category_features.name: Data Capture and Transfer
category_features.definition: Import, collect, and capture data from multiple sources

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Bare-Metal Restore
category_features.definition: Restore the physical Window Servers, Desktops and Laptops from the scratch

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Continuous Backup
category_features.definition: Backup of computer data  automatically saving a copy of every change made to that data

category_features.name: Differential Backup
category_features.definition: Cumulative backup of all changes made since the last full backup

category_features.name: Disaster Recovery
category_features.definition: Plan and implement business continuity measures in case of unforeseen events

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: A type of backup that only copies files that have changed since the previous backup

category_features.name: VM Backup
category_features.definition: Copying of data on a virtual machine (VM) in a VMware environment to prevent data loss

category_features.name: CPU Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor performance details involving CPU/memory utilization

category_features.name: Credential Management
category_features.definition: Change passwords so that the locally stored password on the client can be updated at the same time it is modified on the server

category_features.name: Email Monitoring
category_features.definition: Ability to oversee and optimize the operations of a mail server

category_features.name: Event Logs
category_features.definition: A record of actions or occurrences recognized by software

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Virtual Machine Monitoring
category_features.definition: Manages the operation of virtualized environment on top of a physical host machine

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Anypoint Platform is a leading integration platform for connecting on-premise, SaaS, and mobile systems.
related_products.features: MuleSoft's Anypoint Platform enables users to design, build, publish and manage APIs and integrations with a single product. It also contains API analytics management and a set of packaged connectors for popular applications and protocols. It can be run on-premises, in the cloud, and in hybrid configurations.

related_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
related_products.features: JumpCloud's cloud directory enables internal IT departments, MSPs, VARs/distributors, and DevOps teams to securely enable access to virtually any IT resource. Make cloud management a breeze with a centralized platform for monitoring and granting access to business-critical applications. Choose from a library of 700+ pre-configured SAML apps (including AWS SSO) to provide seamless access to IT resources, whether they're located on-prem or in the cloud, with a single, secure set of credentials.

related_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
related_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
related_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

related_products.short_desc: Datadog is a unified monitoring platform that unifies metrics and events from servers, databases, applications, tools and services.
related_products.features: Datadog is a SaaS-based monitoring, security, and analytics platform for cloud-scale infrastructure, applications, logs, and more. Datadog's platform assists organizations in improving agility, increasing efficiency and providing end-to-end visibility across public, private, and hybrid clouds tacks. By collecting metrics and events from 500+ services and technologies, Datadog enables Dev, Sec, and Ops teams to ensure application uptime and accelerate go-to-market efforts.

related_products.short_desc: Tailored cloud environments with data storage, application hosting, cyber security protection, and live support are purpose-built to me
related_products.features: Abacus Private Cloud provides anywhere, anytime access to your business with a purpose-built, secure, and compliant workspace, dramatically reducing IT management burdens and costs, while increasing your organization's teamwork and productivity.

related_products.short_desc: APPSeCONNECT is an intelligent integration platform (iPaaS) that connects applications and automates business processes.
related_products.features:
APPSeCONNECT's in-built low-code visual integration designer helps users build simple workflows to complex and critical business processes.

It addresses to one of the biggest barriers of a modern-day enterprise - connecting, synchronizing and relating data, applications, and processes among cloud and on-premises systems. It empowers organizations to leverage their existing apps, resources, and technology and streamline their operations in a fast and reliable manner to boost efficiency.

related_products.short_desc: The Cleo Integration Cloud is a scalable, robust file transfer platform designed to facilitate and enable integration with the cloud.
related_products.features: The Cleo Integration Cloud is a highly scalable, robust file transfer platform designed to facilitate and enable integration with the cloud. Cleo provides a flexible solution to seamlessly integrate on premise and cloud based applications, ensuring a comprehensive view of critical business data flows. Our solution incorporates the functionality of a managed file transfer solution with data transformation capacity as well as expanding A2A, B2B, and API business integration technologies.

related_products.short_desc: TextP2P combines Text messaging, Email marketing, and Ringless Voicemail drops into one affordable and easy to use online application.
related_products.features: TextP2P combines Text messaging, Email marketing, and Ringless Voicemail drops into one affordable and easy to use online application. Thousands of small to mid-sized businesses in the US & Canada have used our services to communicate with their customers getting a 98% open rate in under 3 minutes! Save time with our automation features including drip campaigns, keyword signups, automated responses, in-text surveys, and more.  Try it for FREE for 14 days and get 100 FREE text credits.

related_products.short_desc: Pandora FMS and its Cloud Discovery obtain information directly from the different Cloud providers and when they are not accessible.
related_products.features:
Pandora FMS uses remote monitoring of different types to find out all the details of the application.
Automatic and real-time auto-discovery of new infrastructures and services with Discovery Cloud for Azure, Google Cloud and Amazon Web Services.
Ability to analyze metrics over time (years).
Monitoring as a service. It enables hybrid management of classic on-premise environments with different simultaneous Cloud, PaaS and IaaS providers.Automated cost calculation.

similar_products.short_desc: Gain advanced insights into the performance of cloud services hosted in AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.
similar_products.features: Enterprises these days use a variety of cloud services, including AWS, Azure, and GCP, along with their private cloud. Site24x7 allows DevOps to monitor hybrid cloud environments from a single platform. Optimize your cloud ecosystem by providing built-in best practice recommendations and guidance reports. Track the performance of IaaS services, such as virtual machines (VMs) and Kubernetes, and PaaS services like App Service, Event Hubs, and SQL database in your Azure environment.

similar_products.short_desc: Ensure your mission-critical business applications meet end-user expectations with 360-degree monitoring from Applications Manager.
similar_products.features: ManageEngine Applications Manager provides deep-dive performance monitoring for 130+ technologies spanning physical, virtual, and cloud environments. Additionally, it tracks the end-user experience of web applications running on Java, .NET, Ruby on Rails, .NET core, Node.js and PHP platforms. More than 5000 businesses around the world use Applications Manager to quickly detect, isolate and resolve performance issues, effectively plan capacity and ensure optimal performance of their applications.

similar_products.short_desc: Teleport (OSS & Enterprise) is a gateway for managing access to K8s clusters, Linux & Windows servers, databases, and applications.
similar_products.features: Teleport is a secure access solution that consolidates infrastructure access into a single platform. With Teleport, engineers and security teams get unified access to Linux and Windows servers, Kubernetes clusters, databases, and DevOps applications like CI/CD, version control, and monitoring dashboards across all environments. Teleport replaces VPNs, shared credentials, and legacy privileged access management technologies to improve security and engineering productivity.

similar_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
similar_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

similar_products.short_desc: Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is affordable software that can help you detect, diagnose, and resolve network performance issues.
similar_products.features: SolarWinds Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is a powerful and affordable solution that can help you quickly detect, diagnose, and resolve network performance problems and outages. NPM provides advanced network troubleshooting for on-premise, hybrid, and cloud services with critical path hop-by-hop analysis. NPM's comprehensive coverage is designed to enable an IT professional to reduce mean outage time, see return on network investments & determine how to reallocate resources for future health.

similar_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
similar_products.features: JumpCloud's cloud directory enables internal IT departments, MSPs, VARs/distributors, and DevOps teams to securely enable access to virtually any IT resource. Make cloud management a breeze with a centralized platform for monitoring and granting access to business-critical applications. Choose from a library of 700+ pre-configured SAML apps (including AWS SSO) to provide seamless access to IT resources, whether they're located on-prem or in the cloud, with a single, secure set of credentials.

similar_products.short_desc: DigitalOcean enables everyone from developers building personal websites to high-growth startups launching new products.
similar_products.features: DigitalOcean is the Developer Cloud for Modern Apps. We simplify modern app creation for next generation developers working independently, at tech startups, and within SMBs. Our infrastructure- and platform-as-a-service solutions are the first and best at combining the power of simplicity, love for the developer community, an obsession for customer service, and the advantages of open source. Our mission is to bring software development within reach of anyone around the world.

similar_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
similar_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Alumio - an integration platform for digital commerce. Built to scale and accelerate your business for future-proof digital growth.
similar_products.features: Alumio is a cloud-based, no-code iPaaS (Integration Platform as a Service) for digital commerce. It helps create integrations between two or more systems, without any code and via a user-friendly interface. Centralizing all your integrations and data on one platform, Alumio's iPaaS helps eliminate data silos and accelerate process flows across systems for improved digital growth. Alumio offers a future-proof solution for companies looking for fast, flexible and reliable integrations.

Pandora FMS uses remote monitoring of different types to find out all the details of the application.

similar_products.short_desc: Rubrik is the world's first Cloud Data Management platform that delivers data protection, search, analytics, and copy data management
similar_products.features: Rubrik is a single platform that manages all data in the cloud, at the edge, or on-prem for backup, disaster recovery, archival, compliance, analytics, and copy data management. Rubrik powers on your data instantly (for recovery to test/dev) and unleashes hard savings from a converged architecture.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful Cloud Workstations for Graphics Collaboration
similar_products.features: Cloudalize is the cloud platform for software vendors that use game engines for B2B enterprise applications such as architectural visualizations and 3D product configurators. Cloudalize enables the distribution of any app on any device, making a traditional expensive workstation redundant. Cloudalize is also the developer of industry-leading MyGDaaS (GPU-accelerated Desktop-as-a-Service) for GPU-intensive applications such as CAE, CAD, CFD, GIS, 3D, etc.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) Solutions on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) solutions are a type of cloud computing service. IaaS platforms deliver scalable and elastic capabilities using cloud resources to allow businesses to store, manage, and process their data remotely.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Server Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Server Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Server Management software provides monitoring and performance of managed servers. Administrators can isolate server problems, view all server components, and automate monitoring and reporting of server activity. Many server managers cover multiple devices and can provide alerts or auto corrections for network failures. Server Management software is related to Requirements Management software, Patch Management software, and Website Monitoring software.
